decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (201 P1,  205 P1, 210 P1, 215 P2, 220 P2, received on 23/09/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - A splay of 2.4m x 2.4m shall be provided on each side of the access, the depth measured from the back of the footway and the widths outwards from the edges of the access, and no fence, wall or other obstruction to visibility exceeding 0.6m in height above the surface of the adjoining highway shall be erected within the areas of such splays.

Condition : 4 - The access to the front garden should not exceed a width of 3.6m. Reason: To maintain pedestrian and highway safety  in accordance with policy T.5.3 (Vehicle crossovers and hardstandings)
description: Joint application for the re-positioning of the existing vehicular access and creation of additional vehicular access to the front of both properties
